title: GPU FE Design Integration Engineer
summary: Do you intrinsically see the importance in every detail? As part of our Silicon Technologies group, you’ll help design and manufacture our next-generation, high-performance, power-efficient GPU! You’ll ensure Apple products and services can seamlessly and expertly handle the tasks that make them beloved by millions. Joining this group means you’ll be crafting and building the technology that fuels Apple’s devices. Together, we enable our customers to do all the things they love with their devices. This high visibility role in GPU FE Design Integration team includes close interaction with multiple teams, coordinating deliveries across projects and implementing/tracking quality controls while promoting efficiency.
description:
The successful candidate will:
Own RTL integration, design analysis, qualification, packaging and delivery.
Run logic equivalence checking between designs.
Automate front-end design integration process for improving efficiency.
Understand and contribute to specifications for design units.
Collaborate effectively with Architecture, IP, DV, SOC, DFT, Synthesis, P&R and STA teams spanning multiple sites.
key_qualifications:
We are looking for someone to join our team who have:
Proficiency in logic design principles, Verilog/System Verilog and scripting languages (Perl/Ruby/Python).
Knowledge of scalable designs, DFT insertion, LEC, Lint and codeline management.
Knowledge of Power Intent (UPF/CPF) and implementation flows.
Familiarity with GPU/CPU Architecture and micro-architecture.
Ability to work well in a team and be productive under aggressive schedules.
education_experience: We are looking for candidates with a minimum of BS + 3 years of experience.
